pages.title: Death's Odium
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 2 $(li)Treasure = False $(li)Tradeable = True $(li)Rarity = Uncommon $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Whenever an entity dies with this curse active, transfers a percentage of health to the item enchanted

pages.title: Disabling
pages.text: If desired you can disable this Curse for yourself. $(br)Simply enchant a cookie with this enchantment, wear a piece with this enchantment in any armor slot and consume the cookie. $(br)The next time you die you will no longer be effected by this curse
